attributes.title: Ruby Rose Rewinds With Us - #1
attributes.caption: RWBY Rewind discusses the season premiere of Rwby Volume 5
attributes.description: Join Chad James and Yssa Badiola as they discuss the season premiere of Rwby Volume 5 and talk with the voice of Ruby, Lindsay Jones. Also, get a FIRST Look at RWBY Volume 5 Episode 2.

attributes.title: Animating the Action - #2
attributes.caption: Yssa and Chad talk action sequences and see previously unseen art from RWBY in an interview with two of the amazing artists who have helped make the show since day one. And there's a FIRST look at a clip from RWBY Vol. 5 Chapter 3.
attributes.description: Yssa and Chad talk action sequences and see previously unseen art from RWBY in an interview with two of the amazing artists who have helped make the show since day one. And there's a FIRST look at a clip from RWBY Vol. 5 Chapter 3.

attributes.title: The Sounds of RWBY - #3
attributes.caption: Chris and Alena from RWBY's illustrious audio team drop by to share some "sound advice," Chad and Yssa learn how a foley artist makes the sound of Crescent Rose firing a shot, and there's a FIRST look at RWBY Vol. 5 Chapter 4.
attributes.description: Chris and Alena from RWBY's illustrious audio team drop by to share some "sound advice," Chad and Yssa learn how a foley artist makes the sound of Crescent Rose firing a shot, and there's a FIRST look at RWBY Vol. 5 Chapter 4.

attributes.title: Making RWBY Fights Tight - #4
attributes.caption: Chad and Yssa get into the wacky mind of RWBY animator Austin Hardwicke, who sheds light on all the intricate steps involved in making the many fight sequences in RWBY so very tight.
attributes.description: Chad and Yssa get into the wacky mind of RWBY animator Austin Hardwicke, who sheds light on all the intricate steps involved in making the many fight sequences in RWBY so very tight.

attributes.title: Shaping RWBY Into a Diamond - #5
attributes.caption: This week, Yssa and Chad interview two of the classy RWBY editors who explain the many facets of editing such a complex and lovely beast like RWBY.
attributes.description: This week, Yssa and Chad interview two of the classy RWBY editors who explain the many facets of editing such a complex and lovely beast like RWBY.

attributes.title: Bringing All The RWBY Parts Together - #6
attributes.caption: Join Chad and Yssa as they discuss RWBY Volume 5, Chapter 6 and interview the CRWBY team behind the RW_Y reunion!
attributes.description: Join Chad and Yssa as they discuss RWBY Volume 5, Chapter 6 and interview the CRWBY team behind the RW_Y reunion! Also, Get a behind the scenes look at how animation, layout, compositing, and lighting all come together to make RWBY happen.
attributes.display_title: Bringing All The RWBY Parts Together - #6

attributes.title: What It's Like To Be Yang - #7
attributes.caption: We took Yang right out of RWBY and put her on RWBY Rewind to see what makes her tick.
attributes.description: We took Yang right out of RWBY and put her on RWBY Rewind to see what makes her tick. Of course we're talking about Barbara Dunkelman, the voice of Yang! Chad and Yssa discuss Yssa's delayed reaction to characters' bird names and Chad's pants.
attributes.display_title: What It's Like To Be Yang - #7

attributes.title: Weird Mocap Moments - #8
attributes.caption: Yssa and Chad talk RWBY with producer and motion capture specialist Paco Vazquez. Paco talks about who plays the Grimm and other RWBY secrets, then busts out some sweet jokes before facing the dreaded lightning round.
attributes.description: Yssa and Chad talk RWBY with producer and motion capture specialist Paco Vazquez. Paco talks about who plays the Grimm and other RWBY secrets, then busts out some sweet jokes before facing the dreaded lightning round.

attributes.title: New Michael Jones RWBY Character Revealed - #9
attributes.description: Chad, Yssa, and Michael Jones dive deep into Sun Wukong's origin story, a new RWBY character is revealed (kinda), and a historic lightning round is played!
attributes.display_title: New Michael Jones RWBY Character Revealed - #9

attributes.title: The Smoke, Fire, & Explosions of RWBY - #10
attributes.caption: Yssa and Chad dissect the thrilling events of RWBY Volume 5 Chapter 10.
attributes.description: The RWBY visual effects team visits RWBY Rewind to show off some of the incredibly cool tricks of their trade, while Yssa and Chad dissect the thrilling events of RWBY Volume 5 Chapter 10.
attributes.display_title: The Smoke, Fire, & Explosions of RWBY - #10

attributes.title: Can We Talk About Weiss? - #11
attributes.description: Yssa nurses a busted heart, Chad puts on a brave face, & RWBY Lead Producer Koen Wooten shares NOTHING! But Layout/Story Artist Rachel Doda maintains a pleasant demeanor as she walks us through her impressive contributions to RWBY. Watch out for spoilers!

attributes.title: Plot Twist Central - #12
attributes.caption: Chad and Yssa explore and expand on a huge RWBY episode. Erin and Sean from the art team drop by to chat concept art and rigging. Yssa feels better.
attributes.description: Chad and Yssa explore and expand on a huge RWBY episode. Erin and Sean from the art team drop by to chat concept art and rigging. Yssa feels better.

attributes.title: All The Answers - #13
attributes.caption: Co-hosts Yssa and Chad host RWBY co-writer/co-director Miles Luna and director/co-writer Kerry Shawcross in an exciting episode bursting at the seams with co-lossal answers to co-mmunity questions about RWBY.
attributes.description: Co-hosts Yssa and Chad host RWBY co-writer/co-director Miles Luna and director/co-writer Kerry Shawcross in an exciting episode bursting at the seams with co-lossal answers to co-mmunity questions about RWBY.

attributes.title: Jessica Nigri Brings Cinder to Life! - #14
attributes.caption: Chad and Yssa host a stirring finale feauring Jessica Nigri and Gray Haddock
attributes.description: Chad and Yssa host a stirring finale feauring Jessica Nigri and Gray Haddock, the voices of villains Cinder and Torchwick. They discuss the RWBY Volume 5 finale, and Gray gets a secret message from the Couch of Doom.
attributes.display_title: Jessica Nigri Brings Cinder to Life! - #14
